operator_address.description: operator_address defines the validator operator address.

self_bond_rewards.description: self_bond_rewards defines the self delegations rewards.

commission.description: commission defines the commission the validator received.

QueryValidatorDistributionInfoResponse.title: Query Validator Distribution Info Response
QueryValidatorDistributionInfoResponse.description: QueryValidatorDistributionInfoResponse is the response type for the Query/ValidatorDistributionInfo RPC method.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.DecCoin.title: Dec Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.DecCoin.description: DecCoin defines a token with a denomination and a decimal amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Dec which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.
